org.easybatch.core.api.event.step

Interface RecordMapperEventListener


  • public interface RecordMapperEventListener
    Event interface collection for RecordMapper events.

    You should implement this interface in your mapper to declare the ability to receive events from the batch process.

    Author:
    Mario Mueller (mario@xenji.com)

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void afterRecordMapping(Record record, java.lang.Object typedRecord)
      Called directly after the mapper call.
      void beforeRecordMapping(Record record)
      Called before the mapper call.
      void onRecordMappingException(Record record, java.lang.Throwable throwable)
      When the mapper throws an exception, this method will get the exception.

    • Method Detail

      • afterRecordMapping

        void afterRecordMapping(Record record,
                      java.lang.Object typedRecord)
        Called directly after the mapper call.
        Parameters:
        record - The incoming record.
        typedRecord - The mapping result.

      • beforeRecordMapping

        void beforeRecordMapping(Record record)
        Called before the mapper call.
        Parameters:
        record - The record that will be passed to the record call.

      • onRecordMappingException

        void onRecordMappingException(Record record,
                            java.lang.Throwable throwable)
        When the mapper throws an exception, this method will get the exception. In addition you will receive the incoming record for further inspection.
        Parameters:
        record - The record that was processed while the exception was thrown.
        throwable - The exception thrown.
